# title

**Instance Property**

The title for the caption button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The title appears below the caption button.

## Configuring the Caption Button

- **contentImage**: The image displayed in the main content view.
- **contentText**: The text displayed in the main content view.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle of the caption button.
